question: Which nation does not share a border with the Republic of the Congo?
explanation: Nigeria does not share a border with the Republic of Congo. The Republic of Congo is a country of western Central Africa bordered by Gabon to its west; Cameroon to its northwest; the Central African Republic to its northeast and the Democratic Republic of Congo to the southeast; Angolan exclave of Cabinda to its south and the Atlantic Ocean to its southwest. The Republic of Congo is the fourth-largest oil producer in the Gulf of Guinea.
